data.title: Digital assets continue to offer high growth potential in long run
data.description: The global cryptocurrency market has grown 68 per cent year-to-date and would grow further in the next 3-5 years, Cryptomind CEO Sanjay Popli said on Saturday.

data.title: Thailand ready to become a world-class blockchain hub: Prasert
data.description: Thailand has the potential to become a world-class digital hub, which could offer a lot of economic opportunities for the country, Digital Economy and Society Minister Prasert Jantararuangtong said on Saturday.

data.title: Most southern Thais say Pheu Thai affected most by Tak Bai justice failure: poll
data.description: The majority of people in the deep South think that the failure to bring defendants in the 2004 Tak Bai massacre case to justice would most affect the Pheu Thai Party, while the People

data.title: Prawit suffers landslide defeat in Thai aquatics election
data.description: Gen  Prawit Wongsuwon  suffered a landslide defeat as his bid to take over the reins of the Thailand Aquatics Association (TAA) came a cropper Saturday.

data.title: Thai govt under pressure over maritime deal with Cambodia
data.description: The controversial 2001 memorandum of understanding (MoU) with  Cambodia  to jointly develop parts of an  overlapping claim area  (OCA) and set a maritime boundary continues to cast a shadow over Thailand.

data.title: Two pandas to arrive in Thailand from China by 2027
data.description: The Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment (MNRE) is expected to sign a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) next year on the transfer of two pandas from China, says permanent secretary Jatuporn Buruspat.

data.title: Thai govt officials to drive Formula 1 race talks forward
data.description: The government has vowed to bring a  Formula 1  (F1) racing event to Thailand to stimulate economic growth.

data.title: Thai parks dept submits controversial forest bills to cabinet
data.description: The Department of National Parks, Wildlife and Plant Conservation (DNP) will submit two draft laws to the cabinet next week, despite opposition from the People

data.title: WHA Group" reports 71% YoY profit rise to THB 3,312M
data.description: “WHA Group” Reports Strong 9-Month Normalized Profit of THB 3,312 Million in 2024, Up 71% YoY; Interim Dividend of THB 0.0669 per Share Was Approved with XD Date Set for 21 November. Expect to Close Additional Data Center Deals, Reaffirming Thailand as a Key Investment Hub

data.title: Arumugam Kandasamy, Malaysian worker on 'Death Railway', dies at 97
data.description: The oldest surviving worker of the infamous 'Death Railway' between Thailand and Myanmar, Arumugam Kandasamy, has died at the age of 97.

data.title: Arumugam Kandasamy, worker on infamous 'Death Railway', dies at 97
data.description: SEREMBAN: The oldest surviving worker of the infamous 'Death Railway' between Thailand and Myanmar, Arumugam Kandasamy, has died at the age of 97.

data.title: As children face unprecedented challenges worldwide, UNICEF calls for united action towards A Better Tomorrow, Today
data.description: BANGKOK, 7 November 2024 – UNICEF Thailand today launches A Better Tomorrow, a public campaign calling on society to come together to create a safer, healthier, and more hopeful future for every child. In a world of escalating conflicts, health crises, poverty, inequality, and climate-related disasters, UNICEF is urging immediate action to uphold children’s rights and help every child reach their full potential.

data.description: Mainland blasts ban on import of spicy snack popular among Taiwan residents

data.title: Myanmar Embassy in Thailand announces entry ban for overstayers based on duration of overstay
data.description: The Myanmar Embassy in Thailand announced on November 8 that overstayers in Thailand will be banned from re-entering Thailand based on the duration of overstay.
